page.title: 13Entertainment
page.content: The Stag Inn Gullom is the main sourca of entertaimment in the area as local bands are invited to come and play. Locals organise other entertanments such as Dances, usually two a year. One held in January, another after harvest. Occasional dances are held at Howgill Castle and Milburn Grange. Slide shows coffee evenings are also organised. All these events are held in the villege Hall and raise money for local clubs or charities. The village school hold events such as musical evenings and plays once or twice a year to raise funds for the school. Morris Dancers come to the village once a year dancing on the village green. If residents wish to go to the theatre, cinema or to other entertainments they have to travel to other villages Appleby, Penrith or Carlisle.
